radiographic_examinations.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits with a smooth contour. No focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 3 mm. There is a 1.7 cm nonmobile gallstone in the region of the gallbladder neck. Gallbladder distention without wall thickening or pericholecystic edema. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits. Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
